channel.title: HELLO! on Uttam Verma
channel.description: Recent content in HELLO! on Uttam Verma

item.title: Project I: Car Price Estimator
item.description: Created a tool that estimates the car price. Use Vehicle Dataset from cardekho.(Kaggle) Optimized Linear, Lasso, and Random Forest Regressor using GridsearchCV to reach the best model. feature importances for better visualization Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Contact
